Message:
When I came to,
I was all alone,
wandering through
a world of eternal darkness.

Did I lose my eyesight because
my mother lost her voice?

Did I become a witch
because she is one, too?

I do not know
what is happening,
It is my duty to sing...

One day, my show
will come to a close.

So, before my very being
is fractured irrevocably,

I shall believe that the
one who hears this song,

shall be the one who
pulls the curtain on
this tragedy...
